meanings.definition: The quality or state of being crummy.
meanings.sent1: The crumminess of the old car made it hard to sell.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't stand the crumminess of the dirty room.
meanings.sent3: The crumminess of the situation was so obvious, we all burst out laughing.
meanings.sent4: The crumminess of the weather matched my gloomy mood perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The crumminess of the food was unforgettable, leaving a bad taste in my mouth.

meanings.definition: A feeling of dissatisfaction or disappointment.
meanings.sent1: Her face showed crumminess when she received the disappointing news.
meanings.sent2: The crumminess of his attitude made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: Despite the crumminess of the movie, we couldn't help but laugh at its absurdity.
meanings.sent4: The crumminess of the situation hit me like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The crumminess of the outcome left a sour taste in my mouth.
